name: RSLT_RICH_TEXT
description: This table contains rich text results for SmartText type results.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RICH_TEXT
columns.description: The rich text results for the SmartText type result.
